div.p: It is our mission to provide effective, consistent and academically rigorous education in a safe, disciplined and nurturing environment.

We will empower students to reach their full potential by implementing a comprehensive curriculum facilitated by highly effective educators, in collaboration with families and the community, and supported by progressive technology.

div.p: Beacon Academy offers a diverse learning environment and multiple opportunities for students to excel. Rather than a one size fits all model, Beacon's curriculum program is designed to offer students with different needs and learning styles an exceptional academic program
We offer free breakfast and lunch, transportation to eligible students, along with hosting more than 25 community partners and programs.

figure.blockquote: Sending my daughter to Beacon has been my best decision. Her education is very important. The teachers and staff care about her and her education. Walking into the building for any reason you definitely know learning is going on.
